root.name: min()

example.code: int d = min(5, 9); // Sets "d" to 5 int e = min(-4, -12); // Sets "e" to -12 float f = min(12.3, 230.24); // Sets "f" to 12.3
int[] list = { 5, 1, 2, -3 }; int h = min(list); // Sets "h" to -3

root.description: Determines the smallest value in a sequence of numbers.
